summary: FBI agent Copeland shoots but not fatally wound a dissident gunman. His interrogation reveals so many pieces to a plot, that's a threat to city.
cast: Julia Benson|Adam Copeland|Erica Carroll|C.J. Perry|Patrick Sabongui|Mitchell Kummen|Kevin McNulty|Michael J Rogers|Josh Blacker|Bob Frazer|Kwesi Ameyaw|Adrian Petriw|Jana Mitsoula|Todd Thomson|Devielle Johnson|Eric Breker|Yee Jee Tso|Mike Kovac|Paul Jarrett|Zachary Gulka|John Hainsworth|Fraser Corbett|Kavandeep Hayre|Gaalen Engen|Sienna Bohn|Patrick Sparling|Keanu Lam
title: Interrogation
